			<label id="flight-hot-label" for="flight-hot" class="xp-b-left xp-w-label-lob">
													Flight + Hotel
			</label>
		</div>
    </li>
										                                 
    <li>
		<div class="xp-b-clearfix">
			<input id="flight-car" class="wizardRadio xp-b-left" wizardType="flightAndCar" type="radio"  name="srch"/>
			<label id="flight-car-label" for="flight-car" class="xp-b-left xp-w-label-lob">
												Flight + Car
			</label>
		</div>
    </li>
										
    <li>
		<div class="xp-b-clearfix">
			<input id="flight-hot-car" class="wizardRadio xp-b-left" wizardType="flightHotelAndCar" type="radio"  name="srch"/>
			<label id="flight-hot-car-label" for="flight-hot-car" class="xp-b-left xp-w-label-lob">
												Flight + Hotel + Car
			</label>
		</div>
    </li>
										
    <li>
		<div class="xp-b-clearfix">
			<input id="hot-car" class="wizardRadio xp-b-left" wizardType="hotelAndCar" type="radio"  name="srch"/>
			<label id="hot-car-label" for="hot-car" class="xp-b-left xp-w-label-lob">
													Hotel + Car
			</label>
		</div>
    </li>
							</ul>
                        </div>
				</div>
			</div>


			<div id="xp_uw_bottomContainer" class="xp-w-bx-cnt-inn-bot xp-b-clearfix" style="">
				<script type="text/javascript">
					cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.requestURI = "/Home.htm";
				</script>

				<div id="xp_uw_form" class="xp-b-clearfix">
						












		<script type="text/javascript">
		if (typeof(cx.exp.search.common.setABValue)!='undefined')
		{	 
	  	            cx.exp.search.common.setABValue('842', '0'); 
	  	            cx.exp.search.common.setABValue('808', '0'); 
		}
		</script>

<!-- error  panel -->
<fieldset id="errorPnl">
	<div id="errDiv" class="xp-b-noXpend xp-w-row"><!-- div for error messages  --></div>
	<span id="requiredFieldMessage" class="xp-b-noXpend" > Please complete the highlighted fields below</span>
	<span id="dateSequenceMessage" class="xp-b-noXpend" > The check-out date must occur after the check-in date. Please change the date</span>
	<span id="dateFormatMessage" class="xp-b-noXpend" > Date format should be mm/dd/yy</span>
	<span id="ageRequiredMessage" class="xp-b-noXpend" > Please provide the ages of children below</span> 
  <span id="priorToCurrentDateMessage" class="xp-b-noXpend" > The check-in or check-out date is prior to the current date.</span>
  <div id="maxNumberofTravellersMessage" class="xp-b-noXpend" > We are only able to book between 1 and 6 travellers. Please adjust the number of travellers for your search.</div>
	<div id="notequalmessage" class="xp-b-noXpend" > Leaving from and going to field must be different</div>
	<div id="dateSequenceMessage2" class="xp-b-noXpend" > The highlighted departure date is prior to the previous departure date.</div>
    <div id="uw_errorMessage_childrenMustNotBeAlone" class="xp-b-noXpend" > Children must not be allowed to travel without either a Senior or Adult.</div>
    <span id="dateBookedTooFarOut" class="xp-b-noXpend" > We can only accept dates that occur between 02/18/2014 and 01/14/2015. Please enter a new date.</span>
	
</fieldset>

						<p id="uw_flight_airline_tt_close" class="xp-b-floatR xp-l-il xp-bx-cs-tt-close">
							<a href="#" class="xp-l-close-2nd"><span>Close</span><span class="xp-l-icn"><!-- --></span></a></p>

							<h3 id="uw_flight_airline_tt_title" class="xp-s-row">
								No preference search
							</h3>
							<p id="uw_flight_airline_tt_text" class="xp-t-body xp-t-lHeight-med">
A no preference search covers those airlines to which Travelocity has access, which is most airlines. The flights displayed are those for which Travelocity was able to confirm availability. By searching for flights on just one airline, you may be able to find additional choices and possibly even lower prices.							</p>
						</div>

<div class="wiz-template" id="flMultidestTemplate" data-template="
	<div class='xp-w-rnd-inn-cnt'>
		<div class='xp-w-row xp-b-clearfix'>
			<div id='uw_flight_leavingfrom_container@{flightno}' class='xp-w-cell xp-w-cell-large'>
				<label id='uw_flight_origin_label@{flightno}' for='uw_flight_origin_input@{flightno}'><span id='uw_flight_text@{flightno}' class='xp-w-blue'>Flight @{flightno}:</span> Leaving from:</label> 
				<input type='text' name='flightSearchWizard_inpMultiLeavingFrom' id='uw_flight_origin_input@{flightno}' maxLength='100' value='@{multiOrig}'/>
				<input type='hidden' id='hidden_tla_uw_flight_origin_input@{flightno}' name='hiddenDepartureLocationCodes' value=''/>
			</div>
				<div id='uw_flight_dep_time_container@{flightno}' class='xp-w-cell-small'>
					<label id='uw_flight_dep_date_label@{flightno}' for='uw_flight_dep_date_input@{flightno}' style='display: block;'>Departing:</label>
					<input type='text' name='flightSearchWizard_inpMultiDepartureDate' id='uw_flight_dep_date_input@{flightno}' maxlength='12' autocomplete='off' date='false' datemessage='dateFormatMessage' requiredmessage='requiredFieldMessage' value='@{multiDate0}'/>
				</div>
					<div class='xp-w-cell xp-w-cell-mid xp-w-cell-last'>
						<label id='uw_flight_return_time_label@{flightno}' for='uw_flight_dep_time_input@{flightno}'>Time:</label>
						<select name='flightSearchWizard_inpMultiDepartureTime' id='uw_flight_dep_time_input@{flightno}'>
							<option value =12AM [:if '12AM'==timeindex:]selected='selected'[:/if:]>
								12 AM							
							</option>

								1 AM							
							</option>

								2 AM

								3 AM

<div class="wiz-template" id="flChildAgeEntryTemplate" data-template="
	<label id='uw_flight_child_age_label@{childno}' for='uw_flight_child_age_input@{childno}' class='xp-w-label-narrow-child'>Child @{childno}:</label>
    <select id='uw_flight_child_age_input@{childno}' name='flightSearchWizard_inpChildAges' mask='@{agemask}' message='ageRequiredMessage'>
        <option value='-1'>-?-</option>
        <option value='0' [:if 0==childAge:]selected='selected'[:/if:]>&lt;1</option>
            [:list 1..17 as j:]
                <option value='@{j}' [:if j==childAge:]selected='selected'[:/if:]>@{j}</option>
            [:/list:]
    </select>
"></div>

<!-- end of traveller selection panel -->



<script type="text/javascript" id="flightOnlyJs">
flightOnlyFn = function(model){

		var typeaheadO = {};
		typeaheadO.id = 'uw_flight_origin_input';
		typeaheadO.On = true;
		typeaheadO.MinChar = 3;
		typeaheadO.MaxItems =  10;
		typeaheadO.Path = 'http://suggest.expedia.com/hint/es/v1/ac';
		typeaheadO.Locale = "en_US";
		typeaheadO.lob = "FLIGHTS";
		typeaheadO.closeText = "Close";
		typeaheadO.contiueText = "Continue typing to refine search";
        typeaheadO.logTASelections = true;
        typeaheadO.SelectionLogPath = 'http://suggest.expedia.com/hint/es/v1/acclick';
		typeaheadO.itemClickedEvent = function(typeahead) {
										    if(typeahead && typeahead.On){
											    tlaSelector.selectedTypeAhead('uw_flight_origin_input', 'hidden_tla_uw_flight_origin_input', typeahead);
										    }
										};
		TA.setup(typeaheadO);
		TA.init('uw_flight_origin_input');
		var typeaheadD = {};
		typeaheadD.id = 'uw_flight_destination_input';
		typeaheadD.On = true;
		typeaheadD.MinChar = 3;
		typeaheadD.MaxItems =  10;
		typeaheadD.Path = 'http://suggest.expedia.com/hint/es/v1/ac';
		typeaheadD.Locale = "en_US";
		typeaheadD.lob = "FLIGHTS";
		typeaheadD.closeText = "Close";
		typeaheadD.contiueText = "Continue typing to refine search";
        typeaheadD.logTASelections = true;
        typeaheadD.SelectionLogPath = 'http://suggest.expedia.com/hint/es/v1/acclick';
		typeaheadD.itemClickedEvent = function(typeahead) {
										    if(typeahead && typeahead.On){
											    tlaSelector.selectedTypeAhead('uw_flight_destination_input', 'hidden_tla_uw_flight_destination_input', typeahead);
										    }
										};
		TA.setup(typeaheadD);
		TA.init('uw_flight_destination_input');

	//toolTip
		cx.exp.search.flight.tooltipIsOpen = false;
		cx.exp.search.flight.tooltipLinkAction = "open";
		cx.exp.search.flight.tooltipChgState = function(event, action)
		{
			if(action==="changeable")
			{
				action = cx.exp.search.flight.tooltipLinkAction;
			}
			
			if(action==="open")
			{
				cx.exp.search.flight.tooltip.show();
				cx.exp.search.flight.tooltipIsOpen = true;
				cx.exp.search.flight.tooltipLinkAction = "close"
				YAHOO.util.Event.stopEvent(event);
			}
			else if ((action==="close" || action==="closeByBody") && cx.exp.search.flight.tooltipIsOpen)
			{
				cx.exp.search.flight.tooltip.hide();
				cx.exp.search.flight.tooltipIsOpen = false;
				cx.exp.search.flight.tooltipLinkAction = "open"
				if (action==="close") {YAHOO.util.Event.stopEvent(event);}
			}
		}
		cx.exp.search.flight.tooltip = new YAHOO.widget.Overlay("uw_flight_airline_tt", { 
													context:["uw_flight_airline_tt_link","tl","tr", ["beforeShow", "windowResize"], [27,-31]],
													visible:false, 
													width:"416px",
													zindex:"999"
													}); 
		cx.exp.search.flight.tooltip.render(); 

		YAHOO.util.Event.addListener("uw_flight_airline_tt_link", "click", cx.exp.search.flight.tooltipChgState, "changeable", true); 
		YAHOO.util.Event.addListener("uw_flight_airline_tt_close", "click", cx.exp.search.flight.tooltipChgState, "close", true); 
		YAHOO.util.Event.addListener("uw_flight_airline_tt", "click", cx.exp.search.flight.tooltipChgState, "open", true); 
		YAHOO.util.Event.addListener(document.body, "click", cx.exp.search.flight.tooltipChgState, "closeByBody", true); 
	//toolTip

		newModel = 	new cx.exp.search.common.model({
							nRooms:			1,			
							numAdults: 		[1,],
                            numChildren:    [0,], 
							numSeniors: 	[0,], 
							childAges:		[[],],
                            infantOnLap:    true,
							origin:"",
							searchNear:"",
							isDefaultTravellers: true,            						
						prefillEveryField: false
					});

	if (!model) {
		model = newModel;
	}else{
		model.mergeUnchangedDefaults(newModel);
	}

	var flightWizardDTO = new cx.exp.search.common.template.flightWizardDTO({
		agetemplate : 'flChildAgeEntryTemplate',
		ageHTMLStyles : ['xp-w-cell-xsmall'],
		chldAgeDiv : 'uw_child_age_div0',
		inpChldAge : 'uw_flight_child_age_input0',
		chldAgeCnt : 'uw_flight_child_age_container',
		inpAdults : 'uw_flight_adults_input',
		inpSeniors : 'uw_flight_seniors_input',
		countChldSelect : 'uw_flight_children_input',

		chldAgePnlDiv : 'uw_flight_child_age_pnl',
		chldOptPnlDiv : 'uw_flight_infants_container',
		swAddOptPnlDiv : 'uw_flight_add_show_pnl',
		hdAddOptPnlDiv : 'uw_flight_add_hide_pnl',
		addOptPnl : 'uw_flight_add',

		inpFlightAirlinePreference : 'uw_flight_prefAirline_input',
		inpFlightClass : 'uw_flight_class_input',
		inpIsNonstopOnly : 'uw_flight_directFlights_input',
		inpIsAvoidChangePenalty : 'uw_flight_refundFlights_input',
		inpInfantsOnSeat : 'uw_flight_infants_seat_inp',
		inpInfantsOnLap : 'uw_flight_infants_wo_seat_inp',
		returnDateContainer : 'uw_flight_ret_date_container',
		multipleDestinationsContainer : 'uw_flight_multi_dest_container',
		flightTypeCheckboxes : 'uw_flight_type',
		flightDestination : 'uw_flight_destination0',
		hasFlexDate : false,
		elmPrefix : 'uw_flight_'
	});
		
	var config = new cx.exp.search.flight.config( {
		formId : 'fltWizFrm',
		parentDivId : 'uw_flight_wiz',
		lob : 'flightOnly',
		dynModel : model,		
		flightWizardDTO : flightWizardDTO,
		minimumCalendarOffset : '02/18/2014',
		maximumCalendarOffset :	'01/14/2015',
		calendarMinDayOffset : '0',
		defaultAdultSelected : 1,
		defaultChildSelected : 0,
		defaultSeniorSelected : 0,
		maximumAdultCount : 6,
		maximumChildCount : 6,
		maximumSeniorCount : 6,
		dateFormat : 'mm/dd/yy',
		defaultTimeCode : '362',
		multidestTotalCount: '5',
		maxNumberofTravellers: 6,
		hasXsellHotelFlight : true,
		searchActionFlightOnly : 'flightSearchWizard@searchFlights',
		hasShopSurvey : false,
		searchActionFlightHotel : 'flightSearchWizard@searchFlightHotel',
        siteId: 80001,
		postToSearch: '/Search',
		isTypeAheadEnabled : true,
		minTypeAheadChars : 3,
		maxTypeAheadItems :  10,
		typeaheadEndpoint : 'http://suggest.expedia.com/hint/es/v1/ac',
		typeaheadLocale : "en_US",
		allAbTestIds : "842.0|808.0",
		typeaheadLob : "FLIGHTS",
		typeaheadCloseText : "Close",
		typeaheadContiueText : "Continue typing to refine search"			
	});
	
	cx.exp.search.common.replaceAction("fltWizFrm", cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.requestURI);
	return cx.exp.search.flight.wizard.subscribe(null, null, config);
}


</script>

					<div id="divInterstitial" class="xp-w-cont-spinner"></div>
				</div>
                
                    <div id="lowerMerchContainer" class="xp_uw_lowerMerchContainer">
<a href="/p/info-other/guarantees.htm?mcicid=hp.bpg"><img class="pbestPriceGuaranteeImage" src="//media.travelocitycustomercare.com/media/content/expus/graphics/other/bpg/101019_wizard_bpg_150x35_tvly.jpg" width="150" height="34" alt="Travelocity Price Guarantee" /></a>                    </div>
                
			
			</div>
		</div>
<div class="xp-w-rnd-inn-wht-bot"><span><!-- --></span></div>	</div>
	<div class="xp-w-rnd-out-bot"><span><!-- --></span></div>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
    try {cx.exp.search.common.setABValue('1791', '0')} catch (e) {};
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.titleDiv = YAHOO.util.Dom.get("xp_uw_title");
cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.wizardDiv = YAHOO.util.Dom.get('xp_uw_form');
cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.ajaxErrDiv = YAHOO.util.Dom.get("xp_uw_ajaxErrorContainer");
cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.interstitialDiv = YAHOO.util.Dom.get('divInterstitial');
cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.ajaxTimeout = parseInt('10000');
cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.spinnerDelay = parseInt('2000');
cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.timer;
cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.wizardType = '';
cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.wizardObj = null;
cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.cacheWizardContent = new Object();
cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.historyObject = null;
cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.radioButtons = YAHOO.util.Dom.getElementsByClassName("wizardRadio", "input", "xp_uw_lobContainer");
cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.selectedRadioButton = null; //will be init in the .subscribeAllEvents function


// for drop down - AJAX call
expNamespace('cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown');

cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.AjaxObject = {
	    handleSuccess:function(response){
	        try{ 
	            var responseObject = YAHOO.lang.JSON.parse(response.responseText).response;
	            var dropDownDestinationId = document.getElementById("dropDown_destinationId");
				var destinationSelectElement = document.getElementById(dropDownDestinationId.value);
				var browser=navigator.appName;
				if(browser=="Microsoft Internet Explorer")
				{
					var optionHTML = responseObject.destinationList;
					var selectHTML = '<select>'+optionHTML+'</select>';
					var objE = document.createElement("div"); 
					objE.innerHTML = selectHTML; 
					var selectDOM = objE.childNodes[0];
					destinationSelectElement.options.length=0;
			      	destinationSelectElement.innerHTML = '';
			      var selectedNum = -1;
			      var optionCount = 0;
			      for (var i = 0, num = selectDOM.childNodes.length; i < num; i++) 
			      {
			        if(selectDOM.childNodes[0].selected && selectedNum == -1)
			        {
			             selectedNum = optionCount;
			        }
			        if(selectDOM.childNodes[0].nodeName=="OPTION")
			        {
			             optionCount++;
			        }
			      	destinationSelectElement.appendChild(selectDOM.childNodes[0]);
			      }
			      destinationSelectElement.selectedIndex = selectedNum; 
				}
				else
				{
					destinationSelectElement.innerHTML = responseObject.destinationList;
				}
	        }catch (e){ 
	            if(window.console && console.log){console.log("There was a problem updating the destination options! exception: " + e);}
	        } 
	    },
	    handleFailure:function(response){
	    	var namespace = cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container;
	    },
	    startRequest:function(url) {
	        //set disable state to radio buttons before async call started
	        cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.Callback.argument = { wizardType: cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.wizardType};
	        YAHOO.util.Connect.asyncRequest('GET', url , cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.Callback , null);
	    }
	};

cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.changeSelectedDestination = function (selectElement) {
	var index = selectElement.selectedIndex;
	var selectedDestValue = selectElement.options[index].value;
	if(selectedDestValue=='others')
	{
		// TODO drop down here is where the popup window for other POSs should live 
		window.open('http://www.expedia.com','otherPOSs','height=100,width=400,top=0,left=0,toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,resizable=no,location=no,status=no');
		
		selectElement.options[0].selected = true;
	}
};

cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.updateDestinationByOrigin = function() {

	// for dropdown, initial the destination based on the current origin/initial origin to empty(default hint)
    var dropDownOriginId = document.getElementById("dropDown_originId");
    if(dropDownOriginId!=null)
    {
    	var originSelectElement = document.getElementById(dropDownOriginId.value);
		cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.changeSelectedOrigin(originSelectElement);
    }
  
};

cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.changeSelectedOrigin = function (selectElement) {
	
	var namespace = cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container;
	var index = selectElement.selectedIndex;
	if(index==null || index==-1)
	{
		index = 0;
	}
	var selectedOriginValue = selectElement.options[index].value;

	if(selectedOriginValue=='others')
	{
		// TODO drop down here is where the popup window for other POSs should live 
		window.open('http://www.expedia.com','otherPOSs','height=100,width=400,top=0,left=0,toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=no,resizable=no,location=no,status=no');
		
		selectElement.options[0].selected = true;
		selectedOriginValue='';
	}
	
	var randomnumber=Math.floor(Math.random()*11000000000);
	var sUrl = '/ws/SearchWizardWebService/v1/populateDestination?type=' + namespace.wizardType;
    sUrl = sUrl + '&factory=com.expedia.e3.cx.expedia.widgetlibrary.search.common.impl.searchWizardContentHelper.home'
    sUrl = sUrl + '&response=json' + '&rand=' + randomnumber;

 	// for drop down
    	sUrl = sUrl + '&isDropDownOnBool=false'
			+ '&selectedOrigin='+selectedOriginValue
    		+ '&isOriginGroupByCountry=false'
    		+ '&isDestGroupByCountry=false'
    		+ '&isTopCitiesOnBool=false';
    var dropDownIsPackage = document.getElementById("dropDown_isPackage");
    if(dropDownIsPackage!=null)
    {
    	var dropDownIsPackageValue = dropDownIsPackage.value;
  		sUrl = sUrl + '&isPackage='+dropDownIsPackageValue;
    }
  	    
   cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.AjaxObject.startRequest(sUrl);  
    //YAHOO.util.Connect.asyncRequest('GET', url , cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.Callback , null);
};

cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.Callback = { 
	    success:cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.AjaxObject.handleSuccess, 
	    failure:cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.AjaxObject.handleFailure, 
	    scope:cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.AjaxObject.AjaxObject, 
	    timeout:cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.ajaxTimeout, 
		argument: { wizardType: '' }
	};



//enable/disable state of LOB selector radio buttons
cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.disableRadioButtons = function(state){
    var radioButtons = cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.radioButtons;
    for (var i=0; i<radioButtons.length; i++) {
        if(state===true){ //disabling
            radioButtons[i].setAttribute('disabled', 'true');
        } else { //enableing
            radioButtons[i].removeAttribute('disabled');
            //set the selected radio button
            if(radioButtons[i].getAttribute('wizardtype') != cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.selectedRadioButton){
                radioButtons[i].checked = false;
            } else {
                radioButtons[i].checked = true;
            }
        }
    }
};

cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.AjaxObject = {
    handleSuccess:function(response){
        var namespace = cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container;
        try{ 
            var responseObject = YAHOO.lang.JSON.parse(response.responseText).response;
            var content = new Object();
			
            // update the html in the relevant elements to that returned from the web service.
            if (!(YAHOO.lang.isNull(namespace.titleDiv) || YAHOO.lang.isUndefined(namespace.titleDiv))) {
                var titleHTML = responseObject.title;
                if (YAHOO.lang.isUndefined(titleHTML)) {
                    titleHTML = '';
                }
                namespace.titleDiv.innerHTML = titleHTML;
                content.title = titleHTML;
            }
            if (!(YAHOO.lang.isNull(namespace.wizardDiv) || YAHOO.lang.isUndefined(namespace.wizardDiv))) {
                var wizardHTML = responseObject.wizard;
                if (YAHOO.lang.isUndefined(wizardHTML)) {
                    wizardHTML = "";
                }
                namespace.wizardDiv.innerHTML = wizardHTML;
                content.wizard = wizardHTML;               
            }
            namespace.cacheWizardContent[response.argument.wizardType] = content;

			// Note: the wizard's JavaScript code needs to be parsed (note the naming convention wizardType+'Js')
            var jsCode = document.getElementById(response.argument.wizardType + "Js");
			if (jsCode) {
                eval(jsCode.innerHTML);
            }

			// Let's start up the wizard by calling it's initializer function (note the naming convention wizardType+'Fn')
			eval('namespace.wizardObj = '+response.argument.wizardType + 'Fn(namespace.historyObject);');
			
			// for dropdown, initial the destination based on the current origin/initial origin to empty(default hint)
			cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.updateDestinationByOrigin();
			
            //if the response was OK set the selectedRadioButton value to the new selected wizardType
            namespace.selectedRadioButton = response.argument.wizardType;
        }catch (e){ 
            namespace.showError(true);
            if(window.console && console.log){console.log("There was a problem updating the wizard values! exception: " + e);}
        } finally {
	        if (namespace.timer){
	        	clearTimeout(namespace.timer);
	        }        
            namespace.showSpinner(false);
            //remove disable state from radio buttons after async call finished
            namespace.disableRadioButtons(false);
			
        }
    },
    handleFailure:function(response){
    	var namespace = cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container;
    	if (namespace.timer){
        	clearTimeout(namespace.timer);
        }
        namespace.showSpinner(false);
        namespace.showError(true);
        //remove disable state from radio buttons after async call finished
        namespace.disableRadioButtons(false);
    },
    startRequest:function(url) {
        //set disable state to radio buttons before async call started
        cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.disableRadioButtons(true);
        cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.Callback.argument = { wizardType: cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.wizardType};
        YAHOO.util.Connect.asyncRequest('GET', url , cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.Callback , null);
    }
};

cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.Callback = { 
    success:cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.AjaxObject.handleSuccess, 
    failure:cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.AjaxObject.handleFailure, 
    scope:cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.AjaxObject.AjaxObject, 
    timeout:cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.ajaxTimeout, 
	argument: { wizardType: '' }
};

cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.showSpinner = function (show) {
    var namespace = cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container;
    if(show) {
        YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle(namespace.wizardDiv, 'display','none');
        YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle(namespace.interstitialDiv, 'display','block');
    }else {
    	YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle(namespace.wizardDiv, 'display','block');
        YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle(namespace.interstitialDiv, 'display','none');
    }
};

cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.showError = function (show) {
    var namespace = cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container;
    if(show) {
        YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle(namespace.ajaxErrDiv, 'display','block');        
    }else {
        YAHOO.util.Dom.setStyle(namespace.ajaxErrDiv, 'display','none');
    }
};

cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.hideOrShowCallCenter = function(wizardType){
    if(false) {
        if($('#cx_cs_small').length){
            if (wizardType == 'flightOnly') {
                $('#cx_cs_small').css("display", "none");
            }
            else {
                $('#cx_cs_small').css("display", "block");
            }
        }
    }
}


cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.hideOrShowBPG = function(wizardType){
        if($("#lowerMerchContainer").length){
            if (wizardType == 'flightOnly' && false) {
				$("#lowerMerchContainer").css("display", "none");
            }
            else if (wizardType == 'hotelOnly' && false) {
				$("#lowerMerchContainer").css("display", "none");
            }
            else if (wizardType == 'carOnly' && false) {
				$("#lowerMerchContainer").css("display", "none");
            }
            else if (wizardType == 'flightAndHotel' && false) {
				$("#lowerMerchContainer").css("display", "none");
            }
            else if (wizardType == 'activitiesOnly' && false) {
				$("#lowerMerchContainer").css("display", "none");
            }
            else {
                $("#lowerMerchContainer").css("display", "block");
            }
        }
}

cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.changeWizardContent = function(){

	var selectedLob = this.getAttribute('wizardType');

	if (false) {
		if (selectedLob == 'flightAndHotel') {
			// show image and text line			
			document.getElementById('pkgLPBenefitText').style.visibility = "visible";
			document.getElementById('pkgLPBenefitInfo').style.paddingLeft = "5px";
			document.getElementById('pkgLPBenefitInfo').style.paddingBottom = "5px";
			document.getElementById('pkgLPBenefitInfo').style.visibility = "visible";
			document.getElementById('pkgLPBenefitInfo').style.display = "block";
			document.getElementById('existing_upsell').style.visibility = "hidden";
		}
		else {
			// hide image and text line
			document.getElementById('pkgLPBenefitText').style.visibility = "hidden";
			document.getElementById('pkgLPBenefitInfo').style.visibility = "hidden";
			document.getElementById('pkgLPBenefitInfo').style.display = "none";
			document.getElementById('existing_upsell').style.visibility = "visible";
		}
	}

    cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.hideOrShowCallCenter(selectedLob);
    cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.hideOrShowBPG(selectedLob);

	var namespace = cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container, radioButton;
	if (namespace.wizardObj){

		namespace.historyObject = namespace.wizardObj.saveToObj(namespace.wizardObj, namespace.historyObject);
	}

    namespace.wizardType = selectedLob;

    // Redirect Cruise LOB for TVLY US, set LOB to default for back button
        if (selectedLob == 'cruiseOnly') {
        	$('#flight-only').prop('checked', true);
        	namespace.wizardType = 'flightOnly';
        	window.location.href = '/Cruises';
        }

    var content = namespace.cacheWizardContent[namespace.wizardType];

    if (!YAHOO.lang.isUndefined(content)) {
        if (!(YAHOO.lang.isNull(namespace.titleDiv) || YAHOO.lang.isUndefined(namespace.titleDiv))) {
            namespace.titleDiv.innerHTML = content.title;
        }
        if (!(YAHOO.lang.isNull(namespace.wizardDiv) || YAHOO.lang.isUndefined(namespace.wizardDiv))) {
            namespace.wizardDiv.innerHTML = content.wizard;
        }
		// Note: the wizard's JavaScript code has been already parsed, no need to eval() the script tag contents again
		// Let's start up the wizard by calling it's initializer function (note the naming convention wizardType+'Fn')
		eval('namespace.wizardObj = '+namespace.wizardType + 'Fn(namespace.historyObject);');
		// for dropdown, initial the destination based on the current origin/initial origin to empty(default hint)
       cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.updateDestinationByOrigin();
		
        return;
    }
    if(namespace.spinnerDelay){
     	namespace.timer = window.setTimeout(function(){ namespace.showSpinner(true); }, namespace.spinnerDelay);
	}else {
		namespace.showSpinner(true);
	}
    namespace.showError(false);
		var randomnumber=Math.floor(Math.random()*11000000000);
    var sUrl = '/ws/SearchWizardWebService/v1/handleRequest?type=' + namespace.wizardType;
    sUrl = sUrl + '&factory=com.expedia.e3.cx.expedia.widgetlibrary.search.common.impl.searchWizardContentHelper.home'
    sUrl = sUrl + '&response=json' + '&rand=' + randomnumber;

 	// for drop down
    	sUrl = sUrl + '&isDropDownOnBool=false'
    		+ '&isOriginGroupByCountry=false'
    		+ '&isDestGroupByCountry=false'
    		+ '&isTopCitiesOnBool=false'
    		+ '&isPackage=false'
    		+ '&isAddtionalOff=false';
    
    namespace.AjaxObject.startRequest(sUrl);  
};

cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.subscribeAllEvents = function() {
    var namespace = cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container, radioButton; 
    var content = new Object();
	var defaultLob = 'flightOnly';
    //initial the selectedRadioButton (will be run once)
    cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.selectedRadioButton = defaultLob;

    if (!(YAHOO.lang.isNull(namespace.titleDiv) || YAHOO.lang.isUndefined(namespace.titleDiv))) {
        content.title = namespace.titleDiv.innerHTML
    }
    if (!(YAHOO.lang.isNull(namespace.wizardDiv) || YAHOO.lang.isUndefined(namespace.wizardDiv))) {
    	content.wizard = namespace.wizardDiv.innerHTML
    }
    namespace.cacheWizardContent[defaultLob] = content;

	// Since this function is the entry point to wizard JS functionality,
	// let's whether we have a saved wizard state available (back button support)
	var history = YAHOO.util.Dom.get('uw_wizardstate').value;
	// preloadNonDefault will contain the wizard type that should be initially on the page IF it is other than the default wizard
	// otherwise (if we don't need to change the default shown wizard) it can be null.
	var preloadNonDefault = null;
	if (history){
		namespace.historyObject = new cx.exp.search.common.model(YAHOO.lang.JSON.parse(history));
		if (defaultLob == namespace.historyObject.lob){
			// Default wizard needs to be shown - already rendered on the page
			// Let's start up the wizard by calling it's initializer function (note the naming convention wizardType+'Fn')
			eval('namespace.wizardObj = '+namespace.historyObject.lob + 'Fn(namespace.historyObject);');
			
			 // for dropdown, initial the destination based on the current origin/initial origin to empty(default hint)
			cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.updateDestinationByOrigin();
		}
		else{
			// We need to show a wizard other than the default)
		    preloadNonDefault = namespace.historyObject.lob;
		}
	}
	else
	{
		// Previously saved wizard state not available. Default wizard will be shown.
		// Let's start up the wizard by calling it's initializer function (note the naming convention wizardType+'Fn')
		eval('namespace.wizardObj = '+'flightOnlyFn(null);');
	}
    cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.hideOrShowCallCenter(defaultLob);
    cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.dropdown.hideOrShowBPG(defaultLob);

    var radioButtons = cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.radioButtons;
    for (var i=0; i<radioButtons.length; i++) {
        var radioButton = radioButtons[i];
        if (!(YAHOO.lang.isNull(radioButton) || YAHOO.lang.isUndefined(radioButton))) {
               YAHOO.util.Event.addListener(radioButton, "click", namespace.changeWizardContent);
				if (preloadNonDefault === radioButton.getAttribute('wizardType')){
					// If we need to activate a wizard other than the default one, let's manually call the LOB change handler
					namespace.changeWizardContent.call(radioButton); 
				}
				else if (!preloadNonDefault && radioButton.checked && defaultLob != radioButton.getAttribute('wizardType')){
					// If a radio button is pre-selected, make sure we have the right wizard
					namespace.changeWizardContent.call(radioButton);
				}
        }
    }
};

YAHOO.util.Event.onDOMReady(cx.exp.widgetlibrary.search.common.container.subscribeAllEvents);
</script>


    <script type="text/javascript">
        try {
            if (window.jQuery) {
                if (jQuery('#hot-only:checked').length > 0) {
                    jQuery(window).load(function() {
                        loadHotelSRScripts(3000);
                    });
                } else {
                    jQuery("body").delegate("#hot-only", "change", function(){
                        loadHotelSRScripts(500);
                    });
                }
            }
        } catch(e) {}
        function loadHotelSRScripts(delay) {
            setTimeout(function() { 
try{jQuery.ajax({url:"/minify/hotelSearch.css-min-1759673176.css?v=release-2014-02-r1-2874-962065-1",cache:true,async:true,dataType:"text"});}catch(e){}
try{jQuery.ajax({url:"/minify/hotelSearch.js-min-729500602.js?v=release-2014-02-r1-2874-962065-1",cache:true,async:true,dataType:"text"});}catch(e){}
            }, delay);
        }
    </script>

<style>
    a, a:visited {
        color: #004e93;
    }
    div#slide-holder div#slide-controls {
        background-color: #004074;
    }
    div#slide-holder div#slide-controls div.text {
        color: #fff;
    }
    span.offerline2 a {
        color: #fff;
    }
    .rvTabs, .rvRecTitle, .rvTabH, .rvTabF, .rvTabP {
        background-color: #cecece !important;
    }
</style>



<iframe id="ad_CXHOMECORE" class="ad" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0" height="268" width="416" style="border:none;overflow:hidden;width:416px;height:268px;" allowtransparency="true"></iframe>
<script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    var e = document.getElementById('ad_CXHOMECORE');
    if (e) {
        var useAlternateUrl = (true && window.location.hostname && window.location.hostname === "www.travelocity.com");
        var url = useAlternateUrl ? "//shop.travelocity.com/html.cms/TPID=80001&EAPID=0&activity=ff43ffe3-f243-472d-a963-477dec20da08&LANGID=1033&SECURE=0&ip=10.186.108.6&USERTYPE=SHOPPER&EMAIL=NO&PLACEMENT=CXHOMECORE&LOCATION=HOME&SUBLOCATION=SEARCH&ADSIZE=416X268" : "/html.cms/TPID=80001&EAPID=0&activity=ff43ffe3-f243-472d-a963-477dec20da08&LANGID=1033&SECURE=0&ip=10.186.108.6&USERTYPE=SHOPPER&EMAIL=NO&PLACEMENT=CXHOMECORE&LOCATION=HOME&SUBLOCATION=SEARCH&ADSIZE=416X268";
        if (typeof globalAdTileId == "undefined") {
            datePart = new Date().getTime().toString();
            datePart = datePart.substring(datePart.length - 8)
            randomPart = Math.floor((Math.random() * 1e8)).toString();
            window.globalAdTileId = datePart + randomPart;
        }
        url += "&tile=" + window.globalAdTileId;
        e.src = url;
    }
})();
</script>

<div class="wrap">
    <div id="slide-holder">
        <div id="slide-runner">
            <div id="slide-1" class="SliderBox" style="z-index: 6;">

<iframe id="ad_CXHOMECORE_1" class="ad" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0" height="224" width="416" style="border:none;overflow:hidden;width:416px;height:224px;" allowtransparency="true"></iframe>
<script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    var e = document.getElementById('ad_CXHOMECORE_1');
    if (e) {
        var useAlternateUrl = (true && window.location.hostname && window.location.hostname === "www.travelocity.com");
        var url = useAlternateUrl ? "//shop.travelocity.com/html.cms/TPID=80001&EAPID=0&activity=ff43ffe3-f243-472d-a963-477dec20da08&LANGID=1033&SECURE=0&ip=10.186.108.6&USERTYPE=SHOPPER&EMAIL=NO&PLACEMENT=CXHOMECORE_1&LOCATION=HOME&SUBLOCATION=SEARCH&ADSIZE=416X224" : "/html.cms/TPID=80001&EAPID=0&activity=ff43ffe3-f243-472d-a963-477dec20da08&LANGID=1033&SECURE=0&ip=10.186.108.6&USERTYPE=SHOPPER&EMAIL=NO&PLACEMENT=CXHOMECORE_1&LOCATION=HOME&SUBLOCATION=SEARCH&ADSIZE=416X224";
        if (typeof globalAdTileId == "undefined") {
            datePart = new Date().getTime().toString();
            datePart = datePart.substring(datePart.length - 8)
            randomPart = Math.floor((Math.random() * 1e8)).toString();
            window.globalAdTileId = datePart + randomPart;
        }
        url += "&tile=" + window.globalAdTileId;
        e.src = url;
    }
})();
</script>

            <div id="belowColWide">
<!--[if lt IE 8]>
<style type="text/css">
.dividerLine { margin: 25px 0px 12px 0px;}
span.offerline2  {
	content: ".";
	display: inline-block;
	height: 12px;
	clear: both;
}
</style>
<![endif]-->
<script src="/static/publish/travelocity/js/adslider.js"></script>










<style>
.HPSectionInfo a:link, .HPSectionInfo a:visited, .HPSectionInfo a:hover, .HPSectionInfo a:active {color: #00355f;text-decoration: none;}
.HPfindyours {height: 80px; width: 162px; margin-bottom: 3px;}
.everywhere_adcontainer {float:left;margin-left:68px;height:146px;}
.everywhere_adBox {float:left;margin-left:16px;width:146px;height:146px;overflow:hidden;}
.social_box {float:left;width:149px;height:146px;margin:0;}
.social_box a {float:left;display:block;margin-bottom:12px;}
.social_box a.social_col1 {margin-right:12px;}
</style>

<script type="text/javascript">
if('undefined' != typeof(fnTHJSInc) && fnTHJSInc)
{
	fnTHJSInc();
}

function trackClick(linkObj,linkType,linkID)
{
	if('undefined' != typeof(s_exp_trackClick) && s_exp_trackClick)
	{
		s_exp_trackClick(linkObj,linkType,linkID);
	}
}
</script>

<script src="/minify/exp.core.tracking-min-4143621409.js?v=release-2014-02-r1-2874-962065-1"></script><!-- 0 ms -->

	<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">

	var s_account = "expedia80001";

	//We only want to log s_BrandEAPID for a select group of tpid/eapid pairs.
	//Enter the pair below and set the value to the logged eapid
	//s_BrandEAPID table, lookup is 'expedia<Tpid>-<EAPID>'
	s_BrandEAPIDTable = new Object();
	s_BrandEAPIDTable['expedia30035-327'] = '327';
	s_BrandEAPIDTable['expedia30036-392'] = '392';
	s_BrandEAPIDTable['expedia30009-314'] = '314';
	s_BrandEAPIDTable['expedia6-10122'] = '10122';
	s_BrandEAPIDTable['expedia30007-711'] = '711';
	s_BrandEAPIDTable['expedia30007-712'] = '712';

	var s_BrandEAPID = '';
	if('undefined' != typeof(s_BrandEAPIDTable['expedia80001-']))
	{
		s_BrandEAPID = s_BrandEAPIDTable['expedia80001-'];
	}

	//This returns empty string if not in test env
	var s_accountDevPostfix = '';

	//If s_BrandEAPID is set then the OM code will append it to s_account
	//So append the dev postfix to account if blank, but s_BrandEAPID otherwise
	if (s_BrandEAPID.length > 0) {
		s_BrandEAPID += s_accountDevPostfix;
	} else {
		s_account += s_accountDevPostfix;
	}

	//This is for future use so that OM can add 'dev' by itself
	s_exp_isTest = s_accountDevPostfix.length > 0;
	</script>

	s_exp.server = 'www.travelocity.com';

    {

		}

		{
			s_exp.events = s_exp_events;  //override the default
		}

		if(typeof s_exp_prop25 != "undefined")
		{
			s_exp.prop25 = s_exp_prop25;
		}

		if(typeof s_exp_eVar25 != "undefined")
		{

		}

		{
			s_exp.eVar30 = s_exp_eVar30;
		}

		{
			s_exp.currencyCode = s_exp_currencyCode;
		}
	}
	//Homepage

		s_analyticsLoggingCallback(s_exp);
	}

	if ('undefined' != typeof(ProductSiteAnalyticsLogger)
	 && 'undefined' != typeof(ProductSiteAnalyticsLogger.updateOmniture))
	{
		ProductSiteAnalyticsLogger.updateOmniture(s_exp);
	}

<script type="text/javascript">
$LAB.queueWait(function(){
    adroll_adv_id = "MBCGQFA76BBKPGQQRTCAWS";
    adroll_pix_id = "7FJR6V2CSZBVLK57J2P4MT";
    $(document).ready(function() {
        __adroll_loaded=true;
        var scr = document.createElement("script");
        var host = (("https:" == document.location.protocol) ? "https://s.adroll.com" : "http://a.adroll.com");
        scr.setAttribute('async', 'true');
        scr.type = "text/javascript";
        scr.src = host + "/j/roundtrip.js";
        ((document.getElementsByTagName('head') || [null])[0] ||
        document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0].parentNode).appendChild(scr);
    });
}).runQueue();
</script>

<!--

or placed on pages related to sensitive categories.  For more information on
this, see http://google.com/ads/remarketingsetup

    var google_tag_params = {
        site: 'US',
        pagetype: 'home'
    };

    /* &lt;![CDATA[ */
    var google_conversion_id = 984745899;
    var google_custom_params = window.google_tag_params;
    var google_remarketing_only = true;
    /* ]]&gt; */

$LAB.queueScript('//www.googleadservices.com/pagead/conversion.js');
$LAB.runQueue();
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">

$LAB.queueScript('http://img.pulsemgr.com/script/pm/100/');
$LAB.queueWait(function(){
    if (pulse) {
        pulse.setPartnerId('30355');
        pulse.setSite('www.travelocity.com');
        pulse.set('prf','');
        pulse.add('pce','0');
        pulse.add('pty','hp');
        pulse.pulse();
    }
});
$LAB.runQueue();
</script>



        <!--2262 == 0 -->


        <!-- Begin omniture click tracking for homepage wizard radio buttons -->
        <script>
            $(function () {
                var wizardRadioButtonContainer = document.getElementById('xp_uw_lobContainer'),
                    wizardRadioButtons = $(wizardRadioButtonContainer).find('.wizardRadio');
                $(wizardRadioButtons).bind("change", function(e) {
                   var wizardRadioOmnitureMap = {
                      'flight-only'     : 'HP.RB.FLIGHT',
                      'hot-only'        : 'HP.RB.HOTEL',
                      'car-only'        : 'HP.RB.CAR',
                      'activities-only' : 'HP.RB.LX',
                      'cruise-only'     : 'HP.RB.CRUISE',
                      'flight-hot'      : 'HP.RB.FLIGHT:HOTEL',
                      'flight-car'      : 'HP.RB.FLIGHT:CAR',
                      'flight-hot-car'  : 'HP.RB.FLIGHT:HOTEL:CAR',
                      'hot-car'         : 'HP.RB.HOTEL:CAR'
                    },
                    omnitureKey = $(this).attr("id");
                    s_exp_trackClick(this, 'a', wizardRadioOmnitureMap[omnitureKey]);
                });
            });
        </script>
        <!-- end omniture click tracking for homepage wizard radio buttons -->
        
        <!-- Show either big or small Unreal Deal placement based on available space -->
		<script type="text/javascript">
			$(function () {
				var recentBoxHeight = $('#xp_hp_bCol').height(); 
				var wizardHeight = $('#xp_hp_aCol').height();
				var availableContentSpace = recentBoxHeight - wizardHeight;   
				if(availableContentSpace <= 200)
				{
					$('#variant1_small').show();
				}       
				else
				{
					$('#variant1_large').show();
				}
			});	 
        </script>	
		
    </body>
</html>
